ai-ds2.3.3:34.2_0: Those who are faithless, unvirtuous, witless, and witless. Abstaining from eating at midday, the food, drinking as witlessness, the meals, and the food that happens.
ai-ds2.3.3:35.2_0: Reflecting properly, they are unrepulsive in the teaching of the noble ones, unrestrained, without quarreling, blemishing, and regarding the unrestrained.
ai-ds2.3.3:36.1_0: Herein, what is accomplishment in good friendship?
ai-ds2.3.3:36.2_0: Mendicants, there are those who are faithful, ethical, possessing faith, generosity, and wisdom. Those who associate with them, adorned with meals, abstaining from food and drink, adornments, and inviting them to a meal.
ai-ds2.3.3:36.3_0: This is called accomplishment in good friendship.
ai-ds2.3.3:37.2_0: And the five aggregates, that is, their offenses are their composal.

ai-ds2.3.3:40.2_0: When there is a difference in both places, in what is skillful and regained, and right view.

The nose consciousness element, and tongue consciousness element. The body element, touch element, and body consciousness element. The mind element, thought element, and mind consciousness element.
ai-ds2.3.3:41.3_0: People understand the elements of initiative, their wisdom, their right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.

ai-ds2.3.3:42.3_0: This is called accomplishment in attention.
ai-ds2.3.3:43.3_0: eye and sights, ear and sounds, nose and smells, tongue and tastes, body and touches.
ai-ds2.3.3:43.4_0: An individual who understands the sense fields of the dimension of infinite space ...
ai-ds2.3.3:43.5_0: This is called the sense fields.
ai-ds2.3.3:44.2_0: ignorance is a condition for choices. Name and form are a condition for consciousness. Name and form are conditions for the six sense fields. The six sense fields are conditions for contact. Contact is a condition for feeling. Feeling is a condition for craving. Craving is a condition for grasping. Grasping is a condition for continued existence. Continued existence is a condition for rebirth. Rebirth is a condition for old age and death, for grief, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress to come to be.
ai-ds2.3.3:44.3_0: That is how this entire mass of suffering originates.
ai-ds2.3.3:44.4_0: And there is the wisdom there is from understanding that is called right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.

ai-ds2.3.3:53.0_0: Seeing the doors and so on,
ai-ds2.3.3:53.1_0: Herein, what is sense doors guarded?
ai-ds2.3.3:53.2_0: When someone sees a sight with their eyes, they get caught up in the features and details.
ai-ds2.3.3:53.3_0: Since the faculty of sight is left unrestrained, bad unskillful qualities of desire and aversion become overwhelming. They don’t practice restraint, they don’t protect the faculty of sight, and they don’t achieve its restraint.
ai-ds2.3.3:53.4_0: Hearing a sound with the ears ...
ai-ds2.3.3:53.5_0: When they smell an odor with their nose ...
ai-ds2.3.3:53.6_0: Tasting a flavor with the tongue ...
ai-ds2.3.3:53.7_0: When we feel a touch with our body ...
ai-ds2.3.3:53.8_0: When they know a thought with their mind, they get caught up in the features and details.
ai-ds2.3.3:53.9_0: Since the faculty of mind is left unrestrained, bad unskillful qualities of desire and aversion become overwhelming. They don’t practice restraint, they don’t protect the faculty of mind, and they don’t achieve its restraint.
ai-ds2.3.3:53.10_0: The faculty of these six faculties is not guarded and criticized,
ai-ds2.3.3:53.11_0: This is called the guarding of the sense doors.
ai-ds2.3.3:54.1_0: Herein, what is not suitable in eating?
ai-ds2.3.3:54.2_0: It’s when someone doesn’t see that is not uncleared, or spittle, or intoxication.
ai-ds2.3.3:54.3_0: There they don’t look for foodless than before.
ai-ds2.3.3:54.4_0: This is said to be not eating in moderation.
ai-ds2.3.3:55.0_0: Seeing the doors and so on, perfume of the sense doors,
ai-ds2.3.3:55.2_0: When they see a sight with their eyes, they don’t get caught up in the features and details.
ai-ds2.3.3:55.3_0: If the faculty of sight were left unrestrained, bad unskillful qualities of desire and aversion would become overwhelming. For this reason, he practices restraint, protecting the faculty of sight, and achieving restraint over it.
ai-ds2.3.3:55.4_0: Hearing a sound with the ears ...
ai-ds2.3.3:55.5_0: When they smell an odor with their nose ...
ai-ds2.3.3:55.6_0: Tasting a flavor with the tongue ...
ai-ds2.3.3:55.7_0: When we feel a touch with our body ...
ai-ds2.3.3:55.8_0: Knowing a thought with their mind, they don’t get caught up in the features and details.
ai-ds2.3.3:55.9_0: If the faculty of mind were left unrestrained, bad unskillful qualities of desire and aversion would become overwhelming. For this reason, he practices restraint, protecting the faculty of mind, and achieving restraint over it.
ai-ds2.3.3:55.10_0: Their sense faculties are guarded and restrained,
ai-ds2.3.3:55.11_0: This is called the sense doors.
ai-ds2.3.3:56.1_0: Herein, what is eating in moderation?
ai-ds2.3.3:56.2_0: It’s when someone reflects properly on the food that they eat:
ai-ds2.3.3:56.3_0: ‘Not for fun, indulgence, adornment, or decoration, but only to sustain this body, to avoid harm, and to support spiritual practice. In this way, I shall put an end to old discomfort and not give rise to new discomfort, and I will live blamelessly and at ease.’
ai-ds2.3.3:56.4_0: In regard to this, whatever food he considers there are, he reflects:
ai-ds2.3.3:56.5_0: This is called eating in moderation.

ai-ds2.3.3:69.1_0: Herein, what is failure in ethics?
ai-ds2.3.3:69.2_0: There is a transgression, verbal transgression, and mental transgression.
ai-ds2.3.3:69.4_0: All the virtuous are poor in virtue.
ai-ds2.3.3:70.1_0: Herein, what is failure in view?
ai-ds2.3.3:70.2_0: There’s no meaning in giving, sacrifice, or offerings. There’s no fruit or result of good and bad deeds. There’s no afterlife. There’s no obligation to mother and father. No beings are reborn spontaneously. And there’s no ascetic or brahmin who is well attained and practiced, and who describes the afterlife after realizing it with their own insight.
ai-ds2.3.3:71.1_0: Herein, what is accomplishment in ethics?
ai-ds2.3.3:71.2_0: Anyone who makes use of their bodily conduct, verbal, or mental deeds.
ai-ds2.3.3:71.3_0: This is called accomplishment in ethics.
ai-ds2.3.3:72.1_0: Herein, what is accomplishment in view?
ai-ds2.3.3:72.2_0: there is meaning in giving, sacrifice, and offerings. There are fruits and results of good and bad deeds. There is an afterlife. There is obligation to mother and father. There are beings reborn spontaneously. And there are ascetics and brahmins who are well attained and practiced, and who describe the afterlife after realizing it with their own insight.
ai-ds2.3.3:72.4_0: This is called accomplishment in view.
ai-ds2.3.3:73.1_0: Herein, what is purity of ethics?
ai-ds2.3.3:73.2_0: Anyone who makes use of their bodily conduct, verbal, or mental deeds.
ai-ds2.3.3:73.3_0: This is called purity of ethics.
ai-ds2.3.3:74.1_0: Herein, what is purity of view?
ai-ds2.3.3:74.2_0: the knowledge of the result of deeds, knowledge of the origin of paths, and the knowledge of the path.
ai-ds2.3.3:75.0_0: purification of view, holding on to purification,
ai-ds2.3.3:76.2_0: intention regarding energy, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
ai-ds2.3.3:77.0_0: Telling the places of the people in the wood,
ai-ds2.3.3:77.2_0: The perils of rebirth, old age, sickness, and death.
ai-ds2.3.3:78.1_0: And they strive properly and equivalently
ai-ds2.3.3:78.2_0: It’s when a mendicant generates enthusiasm, tries, makes an effort, exerts the mind, and strives so that bad, unskillful qualities don’t arise. ...
ai-ds2.3.3:79.0_0: let them fulfill their practices in line with the teachings.
ai-ds2.3.3:79.1_0: To never be content with skillful qualities:
ai-ds2.3.3:79.2_0: May wholesome things be content with the cultivation of wholesome thoughts,
ai-ds2.3.3:80.1_0: and if they don’t never stop trying.
ai-ds2.3.3:80.2_0: Whatever skillful qualities are carefully, unable to develop, cultivate, and make much of accurate meditation, even the ground, and wrapped in the noble ones with noble eightfold path.
ai-ds2.3.3:81.3_0: recollection of past lives, knowledge of the death and rebirth of sentient beings, and knowledge of the ending of defilements.
ai-ds2.3.3:82.3_0: focused only on quenching, and Emancipation.
ai-ds2.3.3:83.2_0: the path of the eightfold is the knowledge of the path.
ai-ds2.3.3:84.1_0: knowledge of the arising of knowledge,
ai-ds2.3.3:84.2_0: the knowledge of the fruit of fruit,
ai-ds2.3.3:84.3_0: The Book of the Anotatta is finished.
